text: Magar on soirone, ki imon ovardand va korhoi soista kardand va Allohro ʙisjor jod kardand va dar vasfi jagonagii Alloh va difo' az pajomʙari Alloh se'rho guftand, ki mardumro ʙa jodi Alloh meandozad va cun mavridi sitam voqe' sudand, ʙo vasilai se'ri xud az musrikonu kofiron intiqom giriftand. Va sitamgoron ʙa zudi xohand donist, ki ʙa ci makone ʙozmegardand
